=inst5.sh=

#!/bin/bash

menu=("Flatpak |apt install flatpak && apt install flatpak gnome-software-plugin-flatpak -y && flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo"
"Ungoogled Cromium| flatpak install flathub com.githuvb.Elston.UngoogledChromium -y"
"Bitwarden| flatpak install flathub com.bitwarden.desktop -y"
"MEGAsync| flatpak install flathub nz.mega.MEGAsync -y"
"Tutanota|flatpak install flathub com.tutanota.Tutanota -y"
"Color Pick| flatpak install flathub org.kryogenix.Pick -y"
"Obsidian| flatpak install flahub md.obsidian.Obsidian"
"VideoDownloader| flatpak install flathub com.github.unrud.VideoDownloader -y"
)
yad_opts=( --form
           --title="Software Installer"
           --text="Install Software"
           --image="logo.png"
           --button="Install" --button="Exit" )

for m in "${menu[@]}"
do
  yad_opts+=( --field="${m%|*}:CHK" )
done

IFS='|' read -ra ans < <( yad "${yad_opts[@]}" )

for i in "${!ans[@]}"
do
  if [[ ${ans[$i]} == TRUE ]]
  then
    m=${menu[$i]}
    name=${m%|*}
    cmd=${m#*|}
    echo "selected: $name ($cmd)"
    $cmd
  fi
done


sudo bash inst6.sh
